item.title: Data Camp (OPT9)
item.description: Data Camp (OPT9) # Teaching # Marc Evrard and Adrien Pavao Class hours # Thursday, 9:00 am to 12:45 am (nov-dec) Prerequisite # Basic Python programming experience Bachelor-level math (calculus, linear algebra, probabilities) Basic Machine Learning (ML) knowledge Summary # A practical oriented class, where students apply ML techniques to simple illustrative examples and then to tackle competitive challenges. It will start with an introduction to present (refresh) the ML landscape.
